CustomField.description: Calculates number of days since campaign interaction date. Excludes weekends
CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY()+1 - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY()+1 - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( FirstRespondedDate - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( FirstRespondedDate - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates number of days since campaign interaction date. Excludes weekends (Kiriti)
CustomField.label: Campaign Member Age (Days)
